properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 9:59PM CST until January 28 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations to around two
inches.

* WHERE...The western Oklahoma Panhandle and the northwest Texas
Panhandle.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon CST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will likely begin as light
rain, then change to light snow late tonight. North winds of 20
to 30 mph with higher gusts may cause areas of blowing snow
along with sharply reduced visibilities.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY
